cards.title: Data Presentation and Interpretation
details: Choose suitable methods for presenting data
Draw and interpret stem-and-leaf diagrams, box plots, histograms, and cumulative frequency graphs

cards.title: Measures of Central Tendency and Spread
details: Calculate and interpret mean, median, mode, range, interquartile range, and standard deviation
Compare data sets using statistical measures

cards.title: Counting Methods
details: Solve arrangement and selection problems, including with restrictions or repetitions

cards.title: Basic Probability Rules
details: Evaluate probabilities by enumeration or calculation

cards.title: Independence and Conditional Probability
details: Understand and test for independence of events

cards.title: Probability Distributions
details: Create and interpret probability distribution tables

cards.title: Binomial and Geometric Distributions
details: Use the formulae and notations for binomial B(n, p) and geometric Geo(p) distributions
Recognise scenarios suitable for these models

cards.title: Properties and Applications
details: Understand the normal distribution as a model for continuous random variables
Use tables and standardisation to solve problems
Apply normal approximation to binomial distribution with continuity correction
